review: If you're looking for a streaming solution this is the best entry level option. After purchasing the ChromeCast I quickly became annoyed with having to stream from a device (computer/phone/tablet). The Fire TV Stick has the apps locally so no need for a separate device. Also with this you get 30 days free of prime which has lots of movies and shows you've actually heard of.This is the product to get if you're debating the two.
